title: Grant admin access to specific Principal ID

requirements.text: Add the Principal ID '2yscf-yuwfq-41ml4-t6ujy-r3ogj-ajbkj-rmiih-uyk25-o34ky-6jpe6-gae' as a hardcoded admin in the backend main.mo file, granting immediate admin access without requiring promotion from another administrator
acceptanceCriteria: The Principal ID '2yscf-yuwfq-41ml4-t6ujy-r3ogj-ajbkj-rmiih-uyk25-o34ky-6jpe6-gae' is permanently authorized as an admin in the backend
The user with this Principal ID can access all admin features immediately upon login
The admin access bypasses the normal promotion system that requires an existing administrator
The AdminRouteGuard component allows access to /admin/* routes for this Principal ID

requirements.text: Ensure the admin authorization check (useIsCallerAdmin hook) correctly identifies the hardcoded Principal ID '2yscf-yuwfq-41ml4-t6ujy-r3ogj-ajbkj-rmiih-uyk25-o34ky-6jpe6-gae' as an admin and grants access to the Admin Dashboard

quotes: Admin access must be granted by an existing administrator

acceptanceCriteria: The useIsCallerAdmin hook returns true for the hardcoded Principal ID
The Access Denied screen no longer appears for this Principal ID when accessing admin routes
The Admin Dashboard page loads successfully for this Principal ID
All admin features (user registrations, verification reviews, SOS locations, member directory, activity logs) are accessible

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui/*
Preserve existing admin promotion system for future administrators
Do not break existing user profile, place, route, meetup, or SOS functionality
nonGoals: Implementing backdoor or bypass mechanisms beyond the explicit hardcoded Principal ID
Modifying the authentication flow or Internet Identity integration
Changing the UI design or layout of admin pages
